ball_color.description: Color of decorating balls. available colors: `black`, `red`, `green`, `yellow`, `blue`, `magenta`, `cyan`, `white`, `default`.

light_color.description: Light of decorating lights. available colors: `black`, `red`, `green`, `yellow`, `blue`, `magenta`, `cyan`, `white`, `default`.

star_color.description: Color of decorating stars. available colors: `black`, `red`, `green`, `yellow`, `blue`, `magenta`, `cyan`, `white`, `default`.

block.description: This resource provides virtual christmas tree to your machine.
